with a=
nd has deliberately been made as a vampire. He will also see
that the spark=

transformation on her body. PM=

set anything specific for her.

some sort

 leak within her spark which caused energon to flow

nder normal circumstances, a transformer's spark would

uted an energy conduit directly from her mouth right

keep her alive,
or as a

do Predecons couldn't

ll the prisons in the

would have had to eat

 battery could
sustain a

 over a week or
about 200

.

to generation some sort of substitute energon
power
> to feed into her spar=
k so she wouldn't need to eat other people's
sparks and
> he could keep her=
 well-fed while he tried to come up with a solution.

ly need to figure out where this leak was and
repair it;
> then finally rem=
oving the conduits that allowed her to eat sparks in the

=

would =
be
> working on a living being.  Perhaps he might even have the time to mak=
e

He

 I have determined that I need to perform surgery

ect the leader.  "Also, I was wondering if you would be
